verbs.description: The announcement [V: is] set to cap more than a year of deliberation and negotiation between Trump and some of his closest aides and allies .
[ARG1: The announcement] is [V: set] [ARG2: to cap more than a year of deliberation and negotiation between Trump and some of his closest aides and allies] .
[ARG0: The announcement] is set to [V: cap] [ARG1: more than a year of deliberation and negotiation between Trump and some of his closest aides and allies] .
